title: Pope Francis slams 'selfish' couples who have pets instead of kids
content:
1. Pope Francis slams 'selfish' couples who have pets instead of kids  New York Post
  2. Pope criticizes couples who adopt pets instead of children: 'a form of selfishness'  Fox News
  3. Opting for pets over children is selfish and 'takes away our humanity,' says Pope Francis  CNN
  4. Pope says couples shouldn't let pets 'take the place of children'  The Week Magazine
  5. Pope Francis: Adoption is among the highest forms of love. St. Joseph knew this.  America Magazine
